values:
I just typed out every gut wrenching emotion and then deleted the entry. and I feel better having not worn my heart on my sleeve. (or LJ).

yay great! 

thanks for the vent!

my heart isnt happy
here.
but i propose these feelings could be 
compared to the motion that the ocean makes.
giving and taking. 
waves breaking - 
and the deeper ends always pull the escaping ones back home.
growth.
it's not the most gentle way 
but then again it's the only way.


i am whole with you.
i really am.

Nobody uses livejournal any more and I'm pretty sure thats gay. I just spent 20 minutes reading old entries and reading friends old entries and it made me think about how much has changed.

Life is both beautiful and horrific and equally at the same time I propose. I don't know if I can do it. But yet 21 years in the making and God is still giving me air to breath so maybe its not time to quit just yet. Do you ever feel like you can't do it? Don't worry I'm not looking for a way out but sometimes I say I'll just throw this fragile heart of mine away and walk around aimlessly without caring. So its not hard.

Thats a cop out. I dont want to be a cop out. In the grand scheme of things, I dont want to be that girl who quit.


(Ps. I miss a million people and I dont know what happened and why, but can we just forget or something and love eachother again. I want you in my life and I want to have the privelage of calling you my friend..and I'm sorry if it was something that I did - most likely. Please take me back. Oh and if you're questioning if this is about you than it is :) and you should call me and forgive me or something: 347-556-2214.)

For the first time in a while
I'm happy that I'm alive.

(and its only because of God)

Doesn't it just make you sick sometimes?



(Lord, come! Let people say I'm crazy for not wanting to experience any more but my weary heart just wants you. You are way better than this and that and all we could experience here. So, come!)





Ok, I need find a way to 'keep on. Yes, I know.

why would you EVER
let your heart cross that line?
you know 
the one I am talking about?

the one that says
that the person you are looking at 
is completely matchless- beautifully unique and far from 
being like any of the other 6 billion people on the earth-
the line that says what they have inside, 
even if searched long and wide
could never be found again.
And so, life without them 
is like losing the only golden one your heart so adored.
is like losing the only one that's here for you.


why would you do that?
everyone leaves eventually.
everyone leaves you.
everyone leaves.




I refuse to subject myself to this kind of destruction.

"Life isn't about praying for the storms to go away
but instead it's about learning how to dance in the rain."

Love
is the 
most
wonderful
thing to have
and the 
most 
horrible
thing to have not.

praise Jesus for the love he gives.



Somedays we might feel like we're dieing and thats because we are. We are all dieing a little each day.

Is anyone else having a hard time? Or is everyone just dancing in fields of rainbows and butterflies? Sorry I missed the memo, where is the field...do you have an address so I can mapquest it? Do I just suck? I think that I do. I think that's what it is, I think I just suck.

I'm going to the beach today and I'm going to get in the ocean and I'm choosing to let it wash away every hindering attribute my heart could produce.
The sun will kiss me and I will feel warm and loved.
:) I will do my best to make this week good even if I cant find this happy field. So, there!

Good day at the beach. By myself but so relaxing and lovely.. I danced in the water and tried to lay out in a place where no one was because I hate my body in a bathing suit. But alas - apparently the beach isn't big enough because it always seems that someone has to be all up in your grill. Oh well. My face got sunburned. :) I love it! The ride home with the windows down and the cooler air and the sun was...romantic. I love Pensacola only for this! 

I have hope that brighter days are coming. I'm holding on for this.

1. Go back to school. (get registered back by this year!)
2. to Become a nurse.
3. Save $2,000.00. (by the end of this year!)
4. Grow out my hair super long.
5. Exercise everyday. Get back to running 3miles a day.
6. Find something helping to others/beautiful to be apart of. (i.e. = volunteer at Ronald Mcdonald)
7. Get a tattoo. 
8. Purchase my own surf board (so I can quit burrowing others)
9. Fix my bicycle and love him by taking him on rides in the park.
10. Get rid of all the clothes I don't ever wear and bring them to helping hand. (streamline)
11. Limit fast food/junk food intakes to one time a week and then once a month and then never again. This means I have to a)grocery shop and b) learn how to cook!
12. Maintain a healthy weight and doing it right!
13. Learn how to play the cello.
14. Take a road trip to Texas first and then California.
15. Accept thyself.
16. Accept more truth.
17. Be a better daughter.
18. Be a better big sister.
19. Be a better friend.
20. Come up innovative/selfless ways to show love to others. (stranger and known people)
21. Go to the dentist. ( I haven't been since I was 14)
22. Go to a girly doctor. (I've never been! haha...the thought alone makes me want to throw up) This one I will avoid with everything me =)
22. Keep friendships.
23. Read 10 amazing pieces of literature (by the end of the year).
24. Be more positive/less defeated/more happy/less worried/more lighthearted/less anxious.
25. Love God.

When the night has come
And the land is dark
And the moon is the only light we'll see
No I won't be afraid, no I won't be afraid
Just as long as you stand, stand by me

And darlin', darlin', stand by me, oh now now stand by me
Stand by me, stand by me

If the sky that we look upon
Should tumble and fall
And the mountains should crumble to the sea
I won't cry, I won't cry, no I won't shed a tear
Just as long as you stand, stand by me

And darlin', darlin', stand by me, oh stand by me
Stand by me, stand by me, stand by me-e, yeah

Whenever you're in trouble won't you stand by me, oh now now stand by me
Oh stand by me, stand by me, stand by me

Darlin', darlin', stand by me-e, stand by me
Oh stand by me, stand by me, stand by me

I feel like I'm not living. As if there was something so much greater I'm supposed to be doing with the minutes in my day...as if there is this thing that I'm supposed to be apart of and every moment I'm not is a waste.I'm sure it's love. I'm sure it's love! I'm SURE IT'S LOVE! Loving every single human being I come in contact with 3 billion times more than I do right now. I'm sure it's being like Jesus.

I think the depth of the pain we feel should be an indicator of the bare minimum of the depth of the love we should give...so that way the pain doesn't overcome us but instead make us that much more effective and beautiful and kind and graceful and strong.



ALL the LOVE we could ever want is found in the face of God. I know that in my head and I hope my heart can find that to be real and enough again. I hope that get's me through.



...I would die without you.

Hey everyone who reads this - 

 I need you guys to pray for my brother on the 12th! I'm trying to get 100 people to say they will commit for 10 seconds and send a little prayer up for him.

Please find it in your heart to love someone in this EASY way!

let me know if you're in!

if needed be 
start a fire inside
one thats burning and screams
stay alive
stay alive
one thats yearning and pleads
stay alive 
stay alive

start one inside and
whatever you do, stay alive.

that's it !!!

there's only so much one can take.
i am not taking any more.
life can be amazing and i want to go back and try to remember how and why.

well, here it goes...

so a lady from my work came into my office today and handed me a box. 
the contents you ask? 
business cards with my name, title, contact info and of course the suave logo on the side! 
are you kidding me? 
it got me thinking about so much. 
people i used to know/ people my age are still in school  
young and enjoying a college experience and happy (i think) 
and i feel like the oldest woman on earth 
only i don't have 12 children or grandchildren or a sweet old husband or years of fond memories to show for my age. 
because i'm not the oldest woman on earth 
i am only 20 years old 
and i have not the slightest idea how to live this thing i've been handed called life. 
and i miss my God 
and i miss my friends 
AND I MISS MY DREAMS
and i miss my joy or the ability to be happy about living! and waking up in the morning! 
and i miss my family. 
and i like my job. 
and i hate being alone at night when work is over because  
the loneliness could be compared to dieing. (no stretch of truth)
and i wish i could find some sort of peace  
about these things that are going on. 

who knew this kind of torment could surface because of a damn business card. (not that I'm not grateful) 
if anyone wants one for their wallet, let me know.

God is worthy of so much more.
And I'm just sorry.

"...take what you can from your dreams,
make them as real as anything..."



yeah.
Jimmy Foo, World Fighters Eat Against Me!

Trades -
a once plump and fed body
for appearances of bones, and unending hunger.
a once stinging known reality
for a drink that is gold and drowns awareness away.
a once time-healed heart kill from him
for an empty line or two that keeps her bound and broken.
Trades.

She trades everything for nothing.
And when there's nothing left to trade
and nothing left to bargain with...
she'll consider stealing  back what was life.

(fall. back. again.)

I know what there is a need for. At least here. There is  a need for someone to open up the shades to welcome the light from the sun. The floors are dark with shadows and the air void of the tiny flying dust particles that come when one ventures to let some light in. I will be the one. I will. If the sun does all the work, and all that is required of us is to open the window, I can do that much.

So I cut all my hair off. It's just about the length of my chin and I think I like it. It feels so much healthier, looks so much "classier" or "mature" (so I hear) and it was a fresh change. 
I'm afraid that the things I find to keep me  momentary smiling during the day leave me so empty by the end of the day. That is the truth. I think that maybe God uses me during the day to bring others up, so it's not that I'm not sincere. It's just I don't realize how truly lost I feel until I walk in the door at night and look around and feel... alone. I don't know...
I hate to sound so "down" in my posts...


I just want to do something amazing for the Glory of God.
I just want to find my significance fully in him.
I just don't want to be fake or blind or selfish anymore.
I just want ... love.

Life is amazing in that you think that your heart has maybe (after 20 years) experienced every feeling it ever could
until you have a day like this one.
Too bad I can't even begin to start to express it.


I believe I'm experiencing somewhat of an emergency. My how God won't let me continue to walk around blinded.


We need to keep changing or else we'll die.

timing has never been a player on my team
or maybe it always has
and the plans that i have for myself
must be so contrary to what God has 
because thats the only reason i would find myself so lost in some situations

random thoughts;
i forgot how much i love my curly hair because i've straightened it for so long
that the past few days of letting it be itself 
has given me more compliments than i've had before
and on top of that, i think my curls do a better job of representing me

i should be cleaning because mom is coming to visit me tomorrow
and she's bringing my little sisters 
and if you know anything about me, you must know how BIG of a deal that is

i realize that my heart has amazingly flushed itself from i'd say 97% of any emotional attachment i've had with the "guys" in my life
and i am just thankful for that really. i  didnt think it could be possible to be healed so much and freed from such irrational and long-ago dated heartache but it is. i probably have only one regret but even that, is slipping through my fingers.

what peace of mind i've come across = this must be more of the presence of Jesus in my life.

I have a few moments here at my house before I must go again, and so I thought I'd write.

Not a bad day for a Tuesday (thus far). I learned something neat on Sunday....The average life time is 70 years and if you convert that into days, than that would mean roughly 27,000 days we're given here. NOW...if you're one of those people that "live" just for the weekend...(like you're just surviving the week so that you can really embrace your life on Saturday and Sunday)  than you really only live 7,000 of those 27, 000 days! IS THAT NOT THE MOST SOBERING THING TO HEAR? I think we're ALL guilty of just hoping Monday - Friday will breeze on by quickly so we can have the weekends to do the things we really want to.  I don't want to be guilty any more though. Because living like that is really wasting my life.God has a significant purpose for me to wake each morning. I really do believe that.  I want to find Him more everyday.


I'm curious as to where next year will find me. It's amazing how much changes in just a few months right?

I think there's no telling.

-nadia



[ Jesus, I want to change. Not for me or anyone else. But because I know that you deserve so much more from my life.  I wish you would just come pay us each a face to face visit once in while. How neat would it be to sit on the swings with you and talk and look at the stars you created and just be amazed. And see who could jump the farthest or swing the highest? I know you could because you are God but maybe you would let me win sometimes.  I don't think it's silly to  picture us together on a swing because YOU are THAT personal and intimate with us...

Oh how  your Love is the most brilliantly radiant light we could ever see!!!! ]

Well...

Honestly, I don't know where to begin. My body is STILL sore from playing an intense game of soccer the other night after church. Could soccer be my long -lost love, you ask? It just might. It's super fun and you don't realize how much exercise you are getting because you are focused on just getting that ball. I can definitley say I appreciate the sport. Maybe some folks will being playing on Monday nights again, and if so, you can bet on seeing me there. 

On a more serious note  = can I just that I don't believe there are words (in ANY present language) that could be used to adequately  describe how MUCH Father has restored my life in just the past few days? Seriously, I get overwhelmed just thinking about it. I think I could live alone the rest of my life, and even neglect all of my ambitions or dreams and just wake up with the perspective of getting to know God more so that He could be glorified MOST in me,and I would be the most satisfied I could ever be with just that. I am desiring nothing else. The Maker of the BILLIONS of stars and the universes and all of creation = is enough for me.

 

Ps. I've been thinking lately ....  what is the benefit of not believing at all? People say that there is no God and they're free to live this life to the fullest because there's no one to answer to in the end. Well to that, I say... life is maybe just a 100 years long and in case you havent paid attention, its not so prestigious or grand here on this earth. If I were to believe that this is all there is, let me say I would never enjoy one single moment because ITS NOT enough to live here alone and never know unconditional love or hope. 
On the flip side? 

How could it be wrong to believe in something so much greater than yourself? If anything, you may begin to realize that the universe doesnt revolve around you, you may begin to sleep peacefully knowing that you're never to old or independent to be neglected by your REAL FATHER, you may begin to live more meaningful days when you regard others before yourself and learn how to LOVE like He does, you may-for the first time- feel you heart come ALIVE as waves of never-ending unconditional perfect love wash over you again and again when you see the cross, you may begin to possess qualities you never knew you could without a little help - love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, and self control. You may actually know true satisfaction and completeness when you realize who you are, where you came from and why you're here. If you ask me, that's what it means to live a full life.

I just got back home from a weekend spent in Georgia. I slept in a country house, went to a bluegrass concert, and had sweet fellowship with my friend Ashley and her hospitable family.  What good memories.

Now that I'm back, I want to  piece my heart back together. I miss so many things it used to own. 

= child-like faith

The truth is I think the world and this life are both completely unbearable without you. I wonder if the parts that I can hardly bear now are the parts that you are not apart of. The parts that I have so conveniently kept you out of, for what reason, I have not the slightest clue. I am in need of  more of who you are,though. That is all. I am in need of you to be God in every single moment of my fickle life.

 Remind me of the depth of it all. How true it really is. Remind me Abba.

On days like this, I need to see you God. When I awake and find I am by myself  here, I long for another encounter with you at the well. You know that my feebleness consistently puts me back in a frightened state. But to hear a whisper from you, or to see just a glimpse of your light- I know that you would quiet my soul once again. Life-Giver, give me life. Here I stand as a empty jar and I know that you ARE abundance! If I an empty, and you are ABUNDANCE, than we are meant to be. I need you because you are everything. Daddy, please.

Revelation 5
8 And when he had taken it, the four living creatures and the twenty-four elders fell down before the Lamb. Each one had a harp and they were holding golden bowls full of incense, which are the prayers of the saints. 9And they sang a new song:
   "You are worthy to take the scroll
      and to open its seals,
   because you were slain,
      and with your blood you purchased men for God
      from every tribe and language and people and nation.
 10You have made them to be a kingdom and priests to serve our God,
      and they will reign on the earth."

 11Then I looked and heard the voice of many angels, numbering thousands upon thousands, and ten thousand times ten thousand. They encircled the throne and the living creatures and the elders. 12In a loud voice they sang:
   "Worthy is the Lamb, who was slain,
   to receive power and wealth and wisdom and strength
   and honor and glory and praise!"

 13Then I heard every creature in heaven and on earth and under the earth and on the sea, and all that is in them, singing:
   "To him who sits on the throne and to the Lamb be praise and honor and glory and power,  for ever and ever!" 14The four living creatures said, "Amen," and the elders fell down and worshiped.

I heard a message from the book of Revelation (chapter 5) and it changed my life. Literally. It's as if more of the scales that were over my eyes fell down and shattered on the ground as my God fed me more glorious truth. He is changing me with His word and I believe my heart is closer than it's ever been. Upon hearing truth from a passage I've read numerous times before, and being so touched deeply with gratitude - I realized something about this life with God. I realized that I don't think I'll ever get over it! (We aren't meant to! ) I have been following Him for 7 years now, and I know I'll never get past what God has done, is doing and what we'll see of Him in the future! It's the most amazing story of deep love and grace...and justice through Jesus!  I get to worship because of this.

Its the greatest sense of completeness and joy, I didn't think I could ever be this...FULL. 
I hope (that if you havent yet) you will turn your eyes and gaze upon the beauty of Jesus Christ and come to know Him. There is nothing else.

Today was good. My heart towards work was better than the norm lately. And for that I'm grateful. My co-worker lended me one of the CDS he had in his car, and I promise I listened to one song on repeat the whole day. Do you have to ask the artist? It was Dave of course. The song "Seek Up". I've heard it a million times before today. But something about it today was similar to a sobering splash of cold water on a face that just woke up. I think his lyrics are just beautiful and profound and truthful at times. Necessary. Thank you Dave.
I also went to get my dress altered after work. My friend's wedding is in just 2 weeks, so we're all running last minute!( Sometimes traditions are used up too often.) I went to a creepy place to get it altered, somewhere down on the rough side of Fairfield because there's an Asian lady who guarantees a good job in a TIMELY matter. Anyway, during the drive I saw a lady on the side of the road who owned the physical characterists of what some might call a prostitute. She looked distraught. I wish I could have done something sincere for her. 

I wonder when my whole life is poured out and there's nothing left, what I'll have to show for it.
I want to be about the things that matter even after I'm gone.
I want to know and have and give: love.

I learned a lesson today. Lately my disappointment could be triggered by my tendency to expect TOO much in PEOPLE. There's nothing wrong or more true about the idea that people can't cut it for me in this life. It's not fair to expect another human being to fill any needs that are in my heart because they DO NOT have the capacity to do it. It's literally impossible. The only one who could do that of course is God. And so I remembered that my problem lately OBVIOUSLY is NOT God, NOR people, but myself and my own perspective and expecations. 


It's like I am looking in the refrigerator for something to wear and in the closet for something to eat. I'm hungry and naked and now I know why!

I have so much on my mind tonight. I miss feeling as if there was at least one person in my life who understood.Or at least one person who cared enough to attempt to. Every day the world seems colder to me. I now know that my heart is lacking just PEACE in general, and I need just a little bit desperately. How can there be days when you absolutely hate everything that your life consists of? Like you've been tolerating so much for so long that one day you realize the bag on your back is just too heavy for you to continue to carry. If the Lord helps me with my momentary obstacles and if he helps me get past them, how is it that on days of weakness and weariness I find that I never fully let them go in the first place? That over time I've accumulated so much ...this WHOLE time I've carried them with me. Have my feet not left the boundaries of square 1? I'm discouraged beyond expression. I hate that I now associate growing up with loneliness and I find them always hand in hand. 
I don't know what to do anymore. 

 
GAHH ...Sometimes everything is so meaningless (ecclesiastes) 



I'm sure that a hug would be like winning the lottery right now
I'm sure that a clear night where I could see the stars would be like him bringing me back to life
I'm sure that a laugh would ease the pain
I'm sure that a night with you would heal every insecurity my heart could ever make

Thank you for knowing everything.
Thank you for knowing what it takes for me to look at You.
Thank you for tearing me down and crushing me so that I realize it is You
that I need. 

" you are the shelter from the rain
and the rain to wash me away.."

What we fail to realize  is that most days, everything is against us.
Everything is trying to get us to turn our eyes from the ONLY giver of HOPE, and to be sad/anxioius/worried/depressed/hopeless about our lives and the circumstances we find ourselves in.
"I will lift my eyes to the MAKER of the mountains I can't climb."
"I lift my eyes unto the hills, where does my help come from? My hope comes from the Lord."

I love remembering that you are all I have Jesus and you are more than plenty! I am so rich because of you. I am complete because of you. I am joyful and thankful and taking my next breath because of YOU!

I'm thankful for:
my new friends
my new phone
the health and ability to work
my mother
MUSIC 
caffeine
moments in the sun
my roommate
a chance at life

It's been a while...
I am sure that I grow more every single day I'm handed. 
These are the moments we're given.. and that's it. There's no turning back or giving them back or stopping and saving them for later.
There's none of that. 
I believe in the love of God  more than I did a year ago, and I hope that days lived will continue to put me in my place in comparison to the big picture. I and you and we are here to know and worship our Maker.

There is everything in Jesus.
 
"When one turns to the Lord, the veil is removed. Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, THERE IS FREEDOM. And we all with unveiled faces, beholding the glory of the Lord are being transformed into teh same image from one degree of glory to another. For this comes from the Lord who is the Spirit."   2 corinthians 3:16

"For God who said, "Let light shine out of darkness" has shone in our hearts to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of god in the FACE OF JESUS CHRIST."   2 corinthians 4:6

I love my brother so much. If anything ever happens to him, my heart will die. I will die.  
I went and visited my mom the past 4 days. It was good to see my little sisters. 
Family is really everything in life. Who else loves you through every step? 


I find comfort in knowing that God really knows every tear I cry. 
Samantha is leaving soon and I am not trying to think about it. 


Think: 
the depth of the love you give is a good indicator at the measure of pain you'll feel when you lose the person you love. 
Is this how I think???

I know one day you won't be here, but God if I don't love you with everything and if I don't make it my personal goal to live for you to KNOW it, the regret later will be the worst pain ever.

I want to go so bad. Soon. Lord take me soon. I want to serve you. Here is my life, this is me.
I think I am miserable because this is the waiting part. I think I am miserable because I know that He has something else planned for me and maybe this isnt it. I have to remember that He is in control. I have to remember that this is a learning lesson.
I am not sure why I do the things I do. I am lonely but everytime someone gets close to I push them away. 
I think I've realized something today...
school is overrated and possibly not intended for me to finish.
Call me a cop out but I dont see how me wanting to move to Africa and just love on little orphans requires a 4 year degree. I dont like how people look down at people who didnt go to/finish college.
But then again maybe school is what I need to do.
I dont know.
I'm just thinking out the possiblities.


I'm so glad I have Jesus in my life. I am a failure and he heals me everyday.
I'm thirsty but I wish it would stop raining.

Ever get the notion that you're sitting back and watching life pass you by.
What is this "thing" that I'm always waiting on?
I want to live fully right in this moment.
There are oppurtunies now.
There are lessons to learn now.
Last night when I prayed 
I sincerely asked God to change me
 because I'm positive
I dont like anything about myself.
He says "I am the author, Nadia.."


:) yes, Lord... YOU ARE.


(( I think 20 is a perfect year to seek Jesus harder than ever before.))
